posts.content:
Firstly my apologies for such short notice but I only received conformation late last night (sort of)

So, this year the club display (or Split Screen Ally) is to be held in a new location, the main arena (show and shine field to you and I). The display starts on Saturday morning at approximately 09:30/10:00, I will be there to park you up. Please participate in this club line up if you can as the arena is huge so I have room for lots of buses! There is no particular criteria, just has to be a split screen type 2 .

Sunday is a different story as at the moment the event organisers don't actually know where our display is going to be located! I will inform you all on Saturday or watch this space if you have a smart phone and can get service. Alternatively buzz me on 07802 884 583.

Looking forward to seeing you all

Cheers

Rikki.

(PS please feel free to put a link to this post on the appropriate websites etc).

Hi Rikki

We will be up in the crewcab we have just finished, what time are we able to leave as we are only attending for the day.

Cheers Will

BDP
At your leisure Will

I'll help round them up if you give me a shout Sat morning Rikki. We'll need a clear route to the arena as there's a fair few people about at 10.00
Brian

author.location: Bridgnorth, Shropshire. I am a member :o)

posts.content: Hi , I'm coming as a Saturday day visitor but will gladly put my bus in the SSVC line up as normal, will I be able to get into the main show ground ok to do this?

Hi Ted

You will need a vehicle pass to get the bus into the show.

author.location: Bridgnorth, Shropshire. I am a member :o)

posts.content: OK - that's me out then..... thanks for the info - I'll just come in the car.

This ^

author.location: Bridgnorth, Shropshire. I am a member :o)

posts.content:
As I understand it you only get a Vehicle Pass as part of a Camping Ticket....

Willing to be proved wrong - seems a bit daft that day visitors can't show their vans...!

author.location: Bridgnorth, Shropshire. I am a member :o)

posts.content: I've sent them an email asking the Question - not holding my breath for a reply now the Shows started...
